sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; import { IUser } from 'src/models'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ClasseroomService } from '../classeroom.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admission', templateUrl: './admission.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admission.component.css'] }) export class AdmissionComponent implements OnInit { users: IUser[]=[]; userForm: FormGroup= new FormGroup({}); Classes: any[] = []; constructor(private userService: UserService, private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private Cla:ClasseroomService) { this.userForm = this.formBuilder.group({ name: ['', Validators.required], register: ['', Validators.required], genre: ['', Validators.required], dateN: ['', Validators.required], adresse: ['', Validators.required], role: ['', Validators.required], father: ['', Validators.required], profession: ['', Validators.required], nationalId: ['', Validators.required], education: ['', Validators.required], mobile: ['', Validators.required], email: ['', Validators.required], password: ['', Validators.required], classe: [null], salaire: [null], }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.Cla.getClasse() .subscribe(classe =>{ this.Classes = classe console.log(this.Classes); }); } addUser() { //if (this.userForm.valid) { const newUser = this.userForm.value; // Get the form data // Call the createUser method from your user service this.userService.createUser(newUser).subscribe((user) => { console.log('User added:', user); // Optionally, reset the form this.userForm.reset(); }); // } } }
